content.text:
# List of honours of the Netherlands awarded to heads of state and royalty

This article serves as an index – as complete as possible – of all the honorific orders or similar decorations awarded by the Netherlands, classified by Monarchies chapter and Republics chapter, and, under each chapter, recipients' countries and the detailed list of recipients.
Awards
Monarchies
Dutch Royal Family
* King Willem-Alexander of the Netherlands:
** Grand Master of the Military William Order (2013)
** Grand Master (since 2013) and Knight Grand Cross of the Order of the Netherlands Lion (1985)
** Grand Master of the Order of Orange-Nassau (2013)
** Co-Grand Master (since 2013) and Knight of the Order of the Gold Lion of the House of Nassau (1980)
** Grand Master (since 2013) and Grand Cross of the Order of the House of Orange (1967)
** Grand Master of the Order of the Crown (2013)
** Grand Master of the Order for Loyalty and Merit (2013)
** Honorary Commander of the Order of Saint John in the Netherlands (2013)}}
** Grand Master of the Order of the Golden Ark (2013)
* Queen Máxima of the Netherlands:
** Knight Grand Cross of the Order of the Netherlands Lion (2002)
** Grand Cross of the Order of the House of Orange (2022)
* Princess Beatrix of the Netherlands:
** Knight Grand Cross and former Grand Master (19802013) of the Order of the Netherlands Lion (1956)
** Former Grand Master of the Military William Order (19802013)
** Former Grand Master of the Order of Orange-Nassau (19802013)
** Former Co-Grand Master (19802013) of the Order of the Gold Lion of the House of Nassau
** Former Grand Master of the Order of the House of Orange (19802013)
** Former Grand Master of the Order of the Crown (19802013)
** Former Grand Master of the Order for Loyalty and Merit (19802013)
** Former Honorary Commander of the Order of Saint John in the Netherlands (19802013)}}
** Former Grand Master of the Order of the Golden Ark (19802013)
* Princess Catharina-Amalia, Princess of Orange:
** Knight Grand Cross of the Order of the Netherlands Lion (2021)
** Knight of the Order of the Gold Lion of the House of Nassau (2021)
* Princess Alexia of the Netherlands:
** Knight Grand Cross of the Order of the Netherlands Lion (2023)
** Knight of the Order of the Gold Lion of the House of Nassau (2023)
* Princess Mabel of Orange-Nassau: Grand Cross of the Order of the House of Orange (2022)
* Prince Constantijn of the Netherlands:
** Knight Grand Cross of the Order of the Netherlands Lion (1987)
** Knight of the Order of the Gold Lion of the House of Nassau (by birth; 1987)
* Princess Laurentien of the Netherlands: Grand Cross of the Order of the House of Orange (2001)
* Princess Irene of the Netherlands: Knight Grand Cross of the Order of the Netherlands Lion (1957)
* Princess Margriet of the Netherlands: Knight Grand Cross of the Order of the Netherlands Lion (1961)
* Pieter van Vollenhoven:
** Knight Grand Cross of the Order of the Netherlands Lion (2004)
** Grand Cross of the Order of the House of Orange (1967)
See also
* Mirror page: List of honours of the Dutch royal family by country
References
